feed.title: Mergeable Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.1.0
entry.content:
This is the initial release of Mergeable (beta).

What's Changed

  • Dockerfile by @ts-mini in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/6
  • Helm Chart by @ts-mini in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/7
  • Allow users to name connections to disambiguate them by @glossawy in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/12
  • Store viewmode locally to persist across refreshes by @ts-mini in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/14
  • Add the ability to star pull requests by @pvcnt in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/18
  • Store configuration in IndexedDB by @pvcnt in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/39
  • Allow to edit a connection by @pvcnt in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/44

New Contributors

  • @ts-mini made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/6
  • @glossawy made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/pull/13

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/reviewer/commits/v0.1.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.2.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.2.0 (beta).

What's Changed

  • Fix conflict when applying both 'org:' and 'repo:' qualifiers by @pvcnt in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/52
  • Manage redirection of SPA with a simpler server backend based on SWS by @davinkevin in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/55

New Contributors

  • @davinkevin made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/55

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.3.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.3.0 (beta).

What's Changed

  • Open a new tab on middle mouse click by @Savageman in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/61
  • Pull requests are stored in IndexedDB and refreshed via a SharedWorker by @pvcnt
  • Command bar to quickly navigate to a pull request using the keyboard by @pvcnt

New Contributors

  • @Savageman made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0
